text:
Hey Guys,

we are searching for a freelance *HubSpot CMSHub* Developer which extend our team for a couple of months (part or full-time) to  work on several client projects.
*Skills needed: JavaScript and React, HubSpot API, CMSHub, hubl, etc.*

If you are interested or know someone, drop me some lines: <mailto:hm@360vier.de|hm@360vier.de>

Thanks a lot
Best

Hans
